code: import React from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Home=()=>{const sections=[{id:'student',title:'Student',path:'/student'},{id:'subject',title:'Subject',path:'/subject'},{id:'lecture',title:'Lecture',path:'/lecture'},{id:'attendance',title:'Attendance Check',path:'/attendance'},{id:'management',title:'Attendance Management',path:'/management'}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"p-6",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-2xl font-bold mb-6 text-gray-800",children:"Home"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"grid grid-cols-1 sm:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-3 gap-6",children:sections.map(section=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:section.path,className:"block",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"bg-white p-6 rounded-lg shadow-md hover:shadow-lg transition-shadow duration-200 flex items-center justify-center h-32",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"text-lg font-semibold text-gray-700",children:section.title})})},section.id))})]});};export default Home;
